Author: Azaryxe
Text: It's been a day, two days max, the weight you're seeing is a combination of food and water weight. Your body will process it within a couple days, and you'll see the weight come off. Depending on what you binged on will effect the water retention. High sodium and carbs causes your body to hold more water.  I know it's difficult to hear and we all want a quick fix, but eating at maintenance to keep your metabolism effective and drinking plenty of water, will help to shift the additional weight. You don't need to be in a deficit since it's not actual fat. Our bodies are complex machines, you have to trust that yours knows what it's doing.
